sentences.sContent: It was an example of the authorities’ lack of foresight .
sentences.sCn: 这是当权者缺乏远见的一个例证。

synos.tran: 先见，远见；预见；深谋远虑

words.tran: 深谋远虑的；有先见之明的；能预料的

trans.tranCn: 先见，远见；预见；深谋远虑
trans.tranOther: the ability to imagine what is likely to happen and to consider this when planning for the future
